case.title: Seeking serious LTR - 43 (Queens, NY)
case.text: Looking for a long term relationship with a man not afraid to commit. Age range 37 to 45. I love to cook, watch movies, the outdoors, weekend getaways, laughing and joking. I am 5'3, chunky(but not fat), brown hair, brown eyes. Smoker. Please be seriously looking for a real relationship and not just a hookup. If u are truly intersted please put LTR in subject.
